Translations.Text: glorified je Jeden zvolat Jeho servant (Muhammad) night Sacred Masjid Mecca) do daleko miesto z prostration surroundings my zehnat v poradie show him some z our znamenie! He bol Hearer Seer
Similarly my dat Moses scripture rendered it beacon Dieta Izrael ze Ona nie set any idol Lord Zvladnut Mi
They bol descendants z those my beriem Noah; he bol appreciative servant
My addressed Dieta Izrael scripture Ona commit gross zlo zem dva krat Ona destined jesen velka heights arrogance
When prvy cas pod ist okolo my send ona servants z ours possess velka might they invade tvoj domov! This bol prophecy pojdem ist okolo
Afterwards my dat ona turn over them zasoba ona a lot z wealth dieta; my dat ona upper hand

Ona zavodny righteousness ona zavodny righteousness tvoj own dobre if ona commit zly ona robit so tvoj own detriment. Thus when 2 cas pojdem ist okolo they defeat ona zapisat masjid iba mat rad they robit prvy cas They wipe out all zisk ona accomplished
Tvoj Lord lejak ona Jeho zlutovanie. Ona revert transgression my counter retribution. My designated Gehenna zaverecny abode disbelievers
This Quran guides lepsie chodnicek brings dobry zvest do believers lead righteous zivot ze they zasluzit velka recompense
Mat rad for those disbelieve Hereafter my chystat them painful retribution
human bol casto prays nieco zranit him myslienka he praying nieco dobry. human bol bol impatient
My rendered night dni 2 znamenie. My robit night dark dni lighted ze ona seek provisions tvoj Lord therein. This i zriadit ona timing system vyznam calculation! My thus explain everything v detail
My zapisnica fate kazdy human bol it puto jeho krk. Dni Vzkriesenie my hand him rekord bol accessible
Read tvoj own rekord! Dnes ona suffice tvoj own reckoner
Whoever guided guided jeho own dobry whoever ist astray robi so jeho own detriment! Ziaden sinner bear zhresit z ktokolvek inak. My never punish 1 sending posol
My je annihilate any obec my let leaders commit vast corruption therein! Once they zasluzit retribution my annihilate it completely
Vela generation have my annihilated Noah. Tvoj Lord bol zdatny v dealing s zhresit Jeho servants; He bol fully Cognizant Seer
Ktokolvek zvolit si this fleeting zivot jeho priority my rush him co my decide dat him potom my commit him Gehenna he suffers forever despised defeated
Mat rad for those zvolit si Hereafter mat rad ich priority zavodny righteousness chvila verit ich efforts appreciated
For each jeden z them my zadovazit; my zadovazit for those these tvoj Lord's bounties. Tvoj Lord's bounties bol inexhaustible
(Note ako my mat radsej some ludia others v this zivot)! differences Hereafter bol daleko velka daleko significant
Ona nie set any inaksie god GOD lest ona koniec despised disgraced
